animeDescription: A series of 16 "short stories" created by the creator's group Images Forum. The stories are:Tokyo Strut (Sato Masahiko, Ueta Mio)Tokyo Trip (Tanaami Keiichi)Fishing Vine (Seike Mika)Yuki-chan (Oyama Kei)Dog & Bone (Shiriagari Kotobuki)Public Convenience (Tabaimo)TOKYO (Uda Atsuko)Black Fish (Aihara Nobuhiro)Unbalance (Ito Takashi)Tokyo Girl (Shimao Maho)Manipulated Man (Wada Atsushi)Nuance (Murata Tomoyasu)Hashimoto (Furukawa Taku)Funkorogashi (Kuri Yoji)Fig (Yamamura Koji)12 Oâ€™Clock (Iwai Toshio)
